SENT.plain: Major neurologic morbidity and mortality with vertebroplasty are rare
We describe a 71-year-old woman who had a stroke approximately 30 minutes after vertebroplasty
Imaging revealed that bone cement had embolized to the left middle cerebral artery
Emergency embolectomy was attempted but was unsuccessful
This report emphasizes the need to be aware that intracranial embolization of polymethylmethacrylate can occur and describes management strategies to consider
